00018 #ifndef BT_GEAR_CONSTRAINT_H
00019 #define BT_GEAR_CONSTRAINT_H
00020 
00021 #include "BulletDynamics/ConstraintSolver/btTypedConstraint.h"
00022 
00023 
00024 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00025 #define btGearConstraintData    btGearConstraintDoubleData
00026 #define btGearConstraintDataName        "btGearConstraintDoubleData"
00027 #else
00028 #define btGearConstraintData    btGearConstraintFloatData
00029 #define btGearConstraintDataName        "btGearConstraintFloatData"
00030 #endif //BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00031 
00032 
00033 
00036 class btGearConstraint : public btTypedConstraint
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039         btVector3       m_axisInA;
00040         btVector3       m_axisInB;
00041         bool            m_useFrameA;
00042         btScalar        m_ratio;
00043 
00044 public:
00045         btGearConstraint(btRigidBody& rbA, btRigidBody& rbB, const btVector3& axisInA,const btVector3& axisInB, btScalar ratio=1.f);
00046         virtual ~btGearConstraint ();
00047 
00049         virtual void getInfo1 (btConstraintInfo1* info);
00050 
00052         virtual void getInfo2 (btConstraintInfo2* info);
00053 
00054         void setAxisA(btVector3& axisA) 
00055         {
00056                 m_axisInA = axisA;
00057         }
00058         void setAxisB(btVector3& axisB)
00059         {
00060                 m_axisInB = axisB;
00061         }
00062         void setRatio(btScalar ratio)
00063         {
00064                 m_ratio = ratio;
00065         }
00066         const btVector3& getAxisA() const
00067         {
00068                 return m_axisInA;
00069         }
00070         const btVector3& getAxisB() const
00071         {
00072                 return m_axisInB;
00073         }
00074         btScalar getRatio() const
00075         {
00076                 return m_ratio;
00077         }
00078 
00079 
00080         virtual void    setParam(int num, btScalar value, int axis = -1) 
00081         {
00082                 (void) num;
00083                 (void) value;
00084                 (void) axis;
00085                 btAssert(0);
00086         }
00087 
00089         virtual btScalar getParam(int num, int axis = -1) const 
00090         { 
00091                 (void) num;
00092                 (void) axis;
00093                 btAssert(0);
00094                 return 0.f;
00095         }
00096 
00097         virtual int     calculateSerializeBufferSize() const;
00098 
00100         virtual const char*     serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const;
00101 };
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 
00107 struct btGearConstraintFloatData
00108 {
00109         btTypedConstraintFloatData      m_typeConstraintData;
00110 
00111         btVector3FloatData                      m_axisInA;
00112         btVector3FloatData                      m_axisInB;
00113 
00114         float                                                   m_ratio;
00115         char                                                    m_padding[4];
00116 };
00117 
00118 struct btGearConstraintDoubleData
00119 {
00120         btTypedConstraintDoubleData     m_typeConstraintData;
00121 
00122         btVector3DoubleData                     m_axisInA;
00123         btVector3DoubleData                     m_axisInB;
00124 
00125         double                                          m_ratio;
00126 };
00127 
00128 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGearConstraint::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00129 {
00130         return sizeof(btGearConstraintData);
00131 }
00132 
00134 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btGearConstraint::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00135 {
00136         btGearConstraintData* gear = (btGearConstraintData*)dataBuffer;
00137         btTypedConstraint::serialize(&gear->m_typeConstraintData,serializer);
00138 
00139         m_axisInA.serialize( gear->m_axisInA );
00140         m_axisInB.serialize( gear->m_axisInB );
00141 
00142         gear->m_ratio = m_ratio;
00143 
00144         // Fill padding with zeros to appease msan.
00145 #ifndef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00146         gear->m_padding[0] = 0;
00147         gear->m_padding[1] = 0;
00148         gear->m_padding[2] = 0;
00149         gear->m_padding[3] = 0;
00150 #endif
00151 
00152         return btGearConstraintDataName;
00153 }
